attributes.action: Increase spending for the Royal Air Force
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the world’s 4th largest economy it’s time we recognised the importance of defence and fully support our armed services. It is clear that the RAF is overstretched with personnel leaving in droves and aircraft breaking under the stress such as the C130k and Puma fleets. I propose we cut spending on non-essential projects and buy more helicopters, more transport aircraft and an increase in personnel.
